fields.description: Please implement a image insertion in the Confluence page editor in the iOS app.
fields.summary: iOS app: Add ability to insert a image from photos / camera

fields.description:
h3. Summary
If you use Chart macro with an Expand macro inside it, the Chart macro will not work. Works on preview mode.

h3. Environment
Confluence 1000.0.0-5de9e2be5bc

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Edit a page
# Add chart macro
# Add expand macro
# Add a table inside the expand macro
# Publish, the chart macro will not work

h3. Expected Results
The table content must be displayed within the Chart macro format.

h3. Actual Results
Chart macro doesn't work and table is displayed without the chart format
 
h3.Workaround
Use Chart without expand macro
fields.summary: Chart macro doesn't work inside Expand macro

fields.description:
I would like to be able to do searches of not only which date some content in Confluence was modified, but also what time on a specific date.

My thought would be to enable using a date and time format for the Last Modified Custom fields. To make things backward compatible and easy to use, you could make the default in the from field be the start of the day and the default in the to field to be the end of the day.

One for a time might be: 2017-11-24T09:00:00-05:00
fields.summary: Confluence Modified By Time Search

fields.description:
h3.Summary
When you move a "Meeting Notes" index page, with all the child pages under it, it will no longer display the overview of the tasks below it.

h3.Steps to Replicate
# Create a brand new Space (no blueprints required)
# Create a page and use the "Meeting Notes" template
# Create some new meeting notes and add new tasks for them
# On the index page, "Meeting Notes", you should see the incomplete tasks and recent meetings.
# Now move this Index page and all child pages under it (all meeting notes) to a new space

h3.Expected Behavior
The pages would be in a new space, and the Index page would show up all the incomplete tasks, and meeting notes under it.

h3.Actual Behavior
The page does not display any result. It is like it was just created from scratch.
fields.summary: Meeting Notes index not behaving properly when moved

fields.description:
h3. Summary

Import a word document fails when using any browsers on Windows (tested with IE11, Microsoft Edge, Firefox and Chrome)
h3. Environment

Cloud

Windows
h3. Steps to Reproduce
 * Import a Word document
 * Create a page in Confluence or go to an existing page. Click the ellipse
 * Choose > Import Word Document
 * Choose Select File

h3. Expected Results
 * The file is imported with success

h3. Actual Results
 * import fails with different error messages:

 * 
 ** _Token verification failed:_ jwt _expired_
 ** _Invalid file type. Only word documents are supported_

h3. Workaround

No known workaround
fields.summary: Import Word Documents not working on Windows

fields.description:
*Summary*

Page Include macro does not display the bars text if the initial page has a roadmap inside.

 

*Environment*

Confluence Cloud

 

*Steps to Reproduce*

1 - Create a page containing a Roadmap

2 - Create another page and add the Page Include macro pointing to the page created in 1

3 - In the roadmap now visible on page 2, the text in the bars will not be visible.

 

*Expected Results*

In the roadmap now visible in page 2, the text in the bars should be visible.

 

*Actual Results*

In the roadmap now visible in page 2, the text in the bars will not be visible.

 

*Notes*

This issue is specific to newly created pages.

 

*Workaround*

Use Google Chrome as a browser.
fields.summary: Page Include macro does not display the bars text if the initial page has a roadmap inside

fields.description: Currently there is now way to analyze Confluence Question statistics for traffic and answers  This feature was at one time available. It would be helpful if it could be reimplemented.
fields.summary: Confluence Questions traffic and answers statistics data

fields.description:
h3. Summary
If a template is using a page properties macro set to hidden and also has variables in the macro, then the user will not be prompted to fill in the variables' value when using the template making the use of variables useless.

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create a page template which includes a page property macro with variables inside.
# Check the *hidden* box.
# Create a page using that new template

h3. Expected Results
The user is prompted to fill in the variables' value in the second step of the page creation.

h3. Actual Results
The second step of the page creation does not display anything. Clicking on *Next* will open the page editor with an empty *Page property* macro.

h3.Workaround
Users will need to fill the *Page property* macro variables value directly in the *Editor*.
fields.summary: Setting a page properties macro as hidden in a template will not prompt the user to fill in variables value when using it

fields.description:
h3. Steps to replicate

# Add confluence question
# Answer the question with the following step
#* Add a panel by clicking +
#* Add a text inside the panel
# Save the answer

h3. Observed behaviour

The text is not shown with the panel.
 !2.png|thumbnail! 


h3. Expected Behaviour

The Text is shown with the panel.
 !1.png|thumbnail!
fields.summary: Panel turn to normal text when added in Answer
Please urgently enable YouTrack Integration macro on Cloud confluence

fields.description:
h3. *Summary*
User raised a ticket regarding multimedia issue when embedding videos on Confluence spaces/pages, where the command bar (play, pause, mute etc) was not showing on the thumbnail, only after couple times refreshing the page or clearing the cache. 

h3. *Customer Impact*
Accordingly, to the customer, all users are being impacted by this issue.

h3. *Environment*
We discovered the bug in the following Scenario:
- Using Windows 10 (fresh install)
- Using Chrome 62 (latest version)
This is the same environment that users are running


h3. Steps to Reproduce
When using the scale at 100%, it causes the command bar to disappear and only reappearing if a user clicks on the thumbnail.

h3. *Expected Results*
Thumbnail should show the command bar, on page load.

h3. *Actual Results*
The bar only shows after a couple times refreshing the page or clearing the cache

h3. *Notes*
- Firefox does not show the same behavior, and everything worked fine for all files.

- Clearing the cache resolved the problem temporarily on chrome.

- If user refreshes the pages couple of times, it also works, but its necessary to do it every time you access the page.

- User pointed the issue mostly about mp4

h3.*Workaround*
Rearranging the scale to 90%, solved the problem and everything works normally.
fields.summary: Multimedia macro not rendering command bar

fields.description:
h3. Summary
When adding Balsamiq Mockup the following error appears
"No macro metadata"
"There is no metadata configured for this macro which means no configuration screen can be presented here.
If this is a user macro then you can add metadata to the template using the User Macro Administration console."

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create a page
# Add Balsamiq Mockup Macro in Page
# Error will appear

h3. Expected Results
# Balsamiq Mockup Macro screen showing "Add Balsamiq Mockups"

h3. Actual Results
"No macro metadata" error appear
 
h3. Notes

h3.Workaround
no workaround
fields.summary: No Macro Metadata error when adding Balsamiq Mockups Macro in Page

fields.description:
When we spec colours in a style guide we usually try to provide the HEX code and a small preview of it. Would be neat if Confluence could automatically recognise an inline hex value (e.g. #ff000) and automatically render a small coloured inline box to show the colour.

 

Thanks.
fields.summary: Inline Colour Preview When Writing HEX Colour Code

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:
 * Add a title to your page
 * Mention someone
 * Preview

Expected:
 * You see a link with the name of the person as the text

Actual:
 * The link has the page title as the text

Notes:
 * One time the mentions were stripped from the page
 * I _think_ one time the page title links made it to view page when publishing but I can't reproduce this.
fields.summary: Mentions are replaced by the page title in the editor

fields.description:
In the new editor UX, some items in the insert menu are missing their icons.

Known:
 * Jira Issue/Filter
 * Status
 * Team Calendars

!Screenshot 2017-11-23 11.13.50.png|width=200!
fields.summary: Some items in the insert menu are missing icons

fields.description:
Hi,

Creating this for a vendor:
{quote}This issue was raised with us by a customer.
h2. Steps
 # Create an app that has a rich-text dynamic macro that renders its' body via the Confluence REST {{contentbody/convert}} API.
 # Create a new page with that macro on it with a Team Calendars macro inside it
 # View the page and observe the team calendar fails to load, with a spinner that sits there forever

h2. Technical Details
 # There are no JS errors
 # There are no XHR errors
 # It looks like the issue is caused by the Team Calendar web resources not being properly loaded in the iframe rendering the response returned via the contentbody/convert API. This would mean the macro is never properly initialized.
 # The module key {{"com.atlassian.confluence.extra.team-calendars:calendar-resources"}} _can_ be found in the parent window. However, it _can not_ be found as a resource inside the iframe of the dynamic macro.

h2. Workarounds

*Not ideal*: Don't put a team calendar inside a dynamic macro.
{quote}
 

I used the "Macros Toolbox for Confluence" and "Team Calendar" Macros to replicate this issue. More information can be found in: [DEVHELP-803|https://ecosystem.atlassian.net/projects/DEVHELP/queues/custom/166/DEVHELP-803]

 

Thanks!

 

Cheers,

Anne Calantog
fields.summary: Team Calendar macros don't render inside a rich-text dynamic macro

fields.description:
h3. Summary

Search Results are inaccurate when the Indexing language is set to other.
h3.  How to Replicate

1. Create a confluence page with some IP Addresses (or numbers) along with text
 2. Set indexing language to "Other"
 3. Search for pages with search-phrase as numbers or IP Addresses
h3. Expected Behavior

Page with the numbers is returned in the search.
h3. Actual Behavior

No pages are returned in the search.

 
h3. Additional Notes

[Configuring Indexing Language|https://confluence.atlassian.com/confcloud/configuring-indexing-language-724765534.html] mentions that the Indexing language can be set to n English (default), German, Russian, Chinese, CJK, Custom Japanese, French, Portuguese, Czech and Greek.

However this option is not available to customers.
fields.summary: [Backend] Search Results incorrect when the indexing language to "Other"

fields.description: It would be handy if an answer could be saved as a draft and reviewed before being published.
fields.summary: As a user I would like to be able to share a draft of an answer to a Question

fields.description:
h3. Summary
Images inside Section Macro are not rendered on PDF Export

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create a Page
# Add a *Section Macro*
# Upload an image and place it inside the Section Macro
# Publish the Page
# Export the page to PDF

h3. Expected Results
All content inside the page should be displayed at the exported PDF.

h3. Actual Results
The image inside the Section Macro is not rendered.
fields.summary: Images inside Section Macro are not rendered on PDF Export

fields.description:
h3. Summary

JIRA issue macro does not load in page comments

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Add a JIRA issue in the comments


h3. Expected Results
Issue should populate and show status

h3. Actual Results
Issue keeps loading forever


h3.Workaround
If there are JIRA issues in the Body of the page, the issues in the comment load as well.
fields.summary: JIRA issue Macro does not load in page comments

fields.description:
Currently, customer is unable to claim the subdomain (example.atlassian.net) and manage their search directly from the Google Webmaster Tool. 

This has caused the customers unable to properly market their contents successfully on the search engine. 

Please provide a way to claim the subdomain from Google Webmaster, from one of the suggested ways by google:
# add a verification file on the root domain 
# allow to add a html meta tag on the home page
fields.summary: Allow Confluence Cloud instances to Claim the Subdomain from Google Webmaster Tool

fields.description:
Dear Sir or Madame

I have two Problems... I wanted to copy text from a wordfile to a confluence page. But in the confluence page it seems that the fonts are different. But in the Wordfile all text has the same font... Can i change the font on a confluence page?

 

The second problem/question is:

I used tasks as a checkbox. But now i wanted to create a list with checkboxes. But if i create a list and want to add a checkbox ([]) then the checkbox shows up and the list disappears... Does it gives something to fix this? Or is this deliberately?

 

Thanks in Advance and best Regards,

Rafael Wyder
fields.summary: Checkbox and Font

fields.description:
Dear Sir or Madame

I have two Problems... I wanted to copy text from a wordfile to a confluence page. But in the confluence page it seems that the fonts are different. But in the Wordfile all text has the same font... Can i change the font on a confluence page?

 

The second problem/question is:

I used tasks as a checkbox. But now i wanted to create a list with checkboxes. But if i create a list and want to add a checkbox ([]) then the checkbox shows up and the list disappears... Does it gives something to fix this? Or is this deliberately?

 

Thanks in Advance and best Regards,

Rafael Wyder

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce
 # Create a single line paragraph
 # Create an ordered list below with several top-level items 
 # Place cursor at the beginning of the paragraph
 # Press shift + down arrow
 # Change to Heading 1

Expected
 * Paragraph becomes an h1
 * List is unaffected

Actual
 * Paragraph becomes an H1
 * _Entire list becomes an h1_

Workaround
 * Don't select the text when changing paragraph style, placing your cursor in the paragraph is enough
 * When selecting, avoid selecting the invisible trailing new line

!trailing-new-line.gif|width=400!
fields.summary: Selecting trailing new line can cause adjacent paragraph to be included when changing paragraph style

fields.description:
*Summary*

Office Word macro does not work as expected when creating a new blog post. {color:#333333}Even if there is a file attached, the drop-down in the macro editor will not display its name.{color}

*Environment*

Confluence Cloud

*Steps to Reproduce*
 # Create a new blog post
 # Attach a word file
 # Insert
 # Other macros
 # Choose Office Word
 # Notice that in the File Name drop-down there is file

*Expected Results*

The attached file name should be displayed in the File Name drop-down

*Actual Results*

The attached file name does not appear in the File Name drop-down.

*Notes*

This issue is specific to blog posts (it is not reproducible when creating new pages)

*Workaround*

Publish the blog and edit it again.
fields.summary: Office word macro does not work as expected when creating new blogs

fields.description:
h3. Summary
When we add sections in Confluence, breaks the formatting of it, putting tables and images in different places than we see in edit mode.

h3. Environment
(!) Confluence 1000.0.0-02447c1

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Try to edit the page I linked
# Add one section and break in two parts
# Add text on the first part
# Add an image or table on the second part
# Add another section below that one
# Publish


h3. Expected Results
Sections will remain the same as when editing it

h3. Actual Results
Sections are formatted in a different way than in edit mode.
 
h3.Workaround
Remove XHTML content from the page
fields.summary: XHTML not working properly on Confluence editor

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
# In an instance with tinymce-4, go to Edit mode on a Page

h3. Expected Behavior
The scrollbar should be fully displayed

h3. Actual Behavior
Part of the scrollbar is hidden by the Editor's toolbar.
fields.summary: Editor bar hides part of the scrollbar

fields.description:
h3. Summary

Removed Calendars keeps showing contributions on Activity Stream. After unsubscribing the Team Calendar add-on, and delete calendars from your Spaces (choosing any of the options displayed), whenever you make a change on the space, like change it's name, this changes will be logged on the Activity Stream among with the ghost calendar changes. If you click on these calendars contributions, you'll be redirected to the calendar page below:

  !activity.png|thumbnail!     !activity_redirect.png|thumbnail!
h3. Steps to Reproduce
 # Subscribe *Team Calendar*;
 # Create a Calendar in one space;
 # Unsubscribe the add-on;
 # Remove the calendar (choosing any option displayed);

       !remove_from_space.png|thumbnail!      !remove_permanentely.png|thumbnail!

      5. Change the space name.
h3. Expected Results

Only the space name changes should be shown on Activity Stream.
h3. Actual Results

Calendar contributions regarding the change of the space name shows.
h3. Workaround

No workaround.
fields.summary: Removed Calendars showing contributions on Activity Stream

fields.description: As a freelancer working for multiple companies using separates accounts for each, I can login with all accounts at once so that I do not have to logout and login every time I switch workspaces.
fields.summary: Enable login with multiple account at the same time

fields.description:
*Summary*

Users reported a visual bug where "People who like this" layout is broken with latest Firefox (v57).

 

*Environment*

Confluence Cloud

*Steps to Reproduce*
 # Login in Confluence Cloud instance
 # Open the "People who like this" dialog for any space
 # Notice that the Follow buttons appear next to the user

*Expected Results*

There should be a space between username and the Follow button.

 

*Actual Results*

There is no space between username and the Follow button.

 *Notes*

We noticed that this reproducible for inline comments and only in Firefox.

*Workaround*

Use a different browner like Google Chrome.
fields.summary: Follow buttons layout issue in "People who like this" dialog

fields.description:
h3. Summary
Links - the pasted URL address  in Address field has /(slash), cannot press the Insert button.


h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Copy the URL. ex http://www.atlassian.com/
# Press Insert Link button on toolbar.
# Point cursor to Address field
# Right click and then Select paste by context menu
# The URL was pasted, but the Insert button is disable.

h3. Expected Results
after pasting the URL, also display the URL in Link text field. and enable Insert button.

h3. Actual Results
disabled Insert button. and not display the URL text  in Link text field.
 
h3.Workaround
Use keyboard shortcut for paste in Address field. 
* windows: Ctrl+v
* macos: Command+v
fields.summary: Links- the pasted URL address  in Address field has /(slash), cannot press the Insert button.

fields.description:
h3. Summary

When trying to create JIRA macros by highlighting a text with bullet point format and click on the JIRA logo/option on the popup, the following message will be displayed:
"KEY-NUMBER has been created, but, there is a problem in adding it to the page. You can manually add it later using JIRA macro. "



h3. Steps to reproduce

* Once in a new page, please add text with bullet point as below:
 !bug2.png|thumbnail! 
* Highlight the text in one of the created bullet points
* Click on the JIRA option from the popup and click create


h3. Expected Results

Insert the macro on the page.


h3. Actual Results

The macro is not added to the page with a message that it can be manually added later.
 !bug.png|thumbnail! 

h3. Workaround

Manually create the macro in the side of the text
fields.summary: Unable to Create JIRA Macros from bullet point format sentence

fields.description:
Allow a more granular configuration of the Autocompletion and Autoformatting functionalities for Customers. 

Such as removing *Mentions* from the Autoformatting, so users are still able to mention others even without the functionality triggered, and provide more granularity on how Customers interact with the editor.
fields.summary: Allow users to configure Autocompletion and Autoformatting

fields.description:
With the rollout of the new Editor, the keyboard shortcut for saving a page has been changed from Ctrl/CMD + S to Ctrl/CMD + Enter/Return. 

Given the ubiquity of the old keyboard shortcut in other applications, we request the reverting to the old keyboard shortcut.
fields.summary: Revert Keyboard Shortcut for Saving Page in new Editor to ctrl/cmd +s

fields.description:
h3.Summary
Allow Confluence users to export a blog-post as XML and WORD, instead of just PDF.

# Go to a Blog-post
# Click on *Ellipsis (...)*
# Choose between *Export to PDF, Export as XML and Export to PDF*

fields.description:

Macro cannot be seen in preview mode.

see screencast http://recordit.co/5zE4IRQZCr

h3. Expected Results

h3. Notes

fields.summary: In preview mode, navigator.getLocation throws "no context function defined"

fields.description:
3. Summary
Site backups for Confluence Cloud fail with task status :DEAD, with or without attachment backup.
h3. Steps to Reproduce
 # Log in to Confluence instance
 # Create a site backup

h3. Expected Results

Site backup should complete successfully
h3. Actual Results

Site backup runs until the step " writing export", times out and on refresh of backup manager page goes to DEAD status.
h3. Workaround

none

 
 *Atlassian Status as of May 2018*

Thanks to everyone for your patience as we worked on this issue. We have identified that backup tasks were failing due to memory issues and communication timeouts. These issues have now been addressed, so most customers should not see problems. If you are still experiencing the "Task status: DEAD" error, please contact support. We've also made improvements to how we handle attachments, which should reduce the time it takes to complete a backup.

In addition, we have identified a separate issue that may occur if new Confluence code is pushed during a backup; the problem arises if the backup takes long enough to be interrupted by a code update. We push code to Confluence Cloud on a regular basis to make sure our customers have access to the latest and best functionality. We will continue to explore ways to reduce the impact of code deploys. In the meantime, if you are scheduling backups regularly, the safest time is Mon-Sat between 4:00 PM and 10:00 PM GMT; for the largest backups, Friday at 4:00PM GMT is preferred.

Confluence Product Management
fields.summary: Confluence Cloud site backup fails with error "Task status: DEAD"

fields.description:
h3. Summary

* Confluence/questions shows blank page on first link

h3. Environment
(Optional - If Applicable)
* Confluence Questions
* https:/bobswift.atlassian.net.

h3. Steps to Reproduce
#  A link to a specific question from an external site shows white screen on first link. Refreshing the browser then shows the correct page.
# Example: For example, a link to a question from this page failed to show any data on first touch: [https://community.atlassian.com/t5/Jira-questions/Bulk-Delete-Issue-Links/qaq-p/275001]

h3. Expected Results

* Link would take user to expected page

h3. Actual Results
*  Link takes user to a blank white page
h3. Notes
* Visitors do not know to refresh, think the link is broken

h3.Workaround
* Refreshing the browser works
fields.summary: Confluence/questions shows blank page on first link

fields.description:
h3. Summary

IE 11 displays a blank dialog for the add symbol macro.

h3. Environment
Internet Explorer 11 (Edge)

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Edit or create a new page
# Click on tool menu + Insert More Content > Symbol

h3. Expected Results

The Symbols available to insert should show up like this:

=== Working Symbols ===
 !Conf_symbols.png|thumbnail! 
===

h3. Actual Results
You get an empty "Symbols" dialog box instead of the expected one:
=== Empty Symbols ===
 !Empty Symbols.png|thumbnail! 
===
You also get an error in the browser Javascript console:
{noformat}
Object doesn't support property or method 'attachEvent'
{noformat}
 
h3. Notes
I have created a video of the issue that you can find here:

=== Edge Error For Symbols ===
 [^Edge error for symbols.mov] 
===

h3.Workaround
Currently the only known workaround is to use a different browser such as Chrome or Firefox.
fields.summary: IE 11 (Edge) does not display the add Symbol modal in Confluence Editor

fields.description:
h3. Problem Definition
Confluence Mobile Users would like the ability to upload Media (photos, documents, etc) from their Mobile Devices

h3. Suggested Solution
Implement an option within the Confluence Mobile App to upload media in Confluence
fields.summary: Ability to Upload in Confluence Mobile

fields.description:
In Confluence, there is no option to move items around through drag & drop and it would require the user has the option to manually copy and paste the content (crtl/cmd+c/v). 

For tables, depending on its size, it would be toilsome for the user to have to select all the content
and have it placed in a different part of the page. This would be a feature request to provide an additional method to copy and paste tables with a button in the editor, which would make it to not carry any formatting tied to the table as well.
fields.summary: Option to Copy/Paste tables in Edit Mode

fields.description:
In Confluence, there is no option to move items around through drag & drop and it would require the user has the option to manually copy and paste the content (crtl/cmd+c/v). 

For tables, depending on its size, it would be toilsome for the user to have to select all the content
 and have it placed in a different part of the page. This would be a feature request to provide an additional method to copy and paste tables with a button in the editor, which would make it to not carry any formatting tied to the table as well.
fields.summary: Option to Copy/Paste tables in the editor

fields.description:
It would have been really helpul to get a small picture on the event/Jira issue, telling who is the assignee. Then you know with one glimt who is the assignee to the Jira issue without having to click into the issue to get to see the assignee. 

In your marketing and videos about the Team Calendar you do have pictures on the events, but I have not found out how this is possible??
fields.summary: Visualize assignee with a picture in the Team Calendar

fields.description:
h3. Problem Definition
Currently user mentions are not one of the supported macros when creating/editing a page in the Confluence Cloud Mobile App. 

When typing '@' there is no pop-up to select a mentionable user.

h3. Suggested Solution
Provide a way to mention users from the mobile app.

h3. Why this is important
There are many missing features so far and I believe this will be one of the most-requested.
 
h3. Workaround 
No known workaround for mobile
fields.summary: Support user mentions in mobile app(iOS)

fields.description:
h3. Problem Definition
Currently user mentions are not one of the supported macros when creating/editing a page in the Confluence Cloud Mobile App. 

When typing '@' there is no pop-up to select a mentionable user.

h3. Suggested Solution
Provide a way to mention users from the mobile app.

h3. Why this is important
There are many missing features so far and I believe this will be one of the most-requested.
 
h3. Workaround 
No known workaround for mobile
fields.summary: Support user mentions in mobile app

fields.description:
h1. Current behavior
As per described in the following Documentation: [Restrict a Calendar|https://confluence.atlassian.com/teamcal/restrict-a-calendar-660737259.html], These are the 2 permission that's available for Team Calendar:

* *Restrict Viewing* - users added to this restrictions can only view the calendar, they will not be able to add events or delete events.
* *Restrict Editing* - users added to this restrictions can view, edit, add events, edit existing events, change restrictions for the calendar and delete event types.

It is undesirable as it seems like you either get full edit access or just view.

h1. Desired behavior
Add a more granularity towards the Team Calendar permission. For example
* Add restrictions on who can create Team Calendar , 
* Add restrictions on who can add bookings to the calendar 
* Add restriction on who can delete the calendar.
fields.summary: Adding more granularity to Team Calendar's Permission Scheme

fields.description:
Hi,

I am Umesh & i am the administrator of Jira software of our company Renalyx.

Actually we are the medical device design & manufacturers .we are looking for Software tool like Jira software for the Document control & record management purpose.

Also i already used the trail version of Atlassian Confluence for the our purpose.

But i need software tool which should have the following aspects 

1) Create any kind of document (word,excel,pdf,ppt,image.etc)

2) Routing of the document with selected people (sending the document for review)

3) Accept or reject of document (if document is accepted, its required have the digital or other kind of signature )

4) Check out the document ( after check out older version should available any point in time)

5) publishing of the document (all part of team  member should get the mail notification)

6) access control between the project or group

Can i able to have the software tool from Atlassian with above mentioned requirements?

or Please suggest your any other products if available with Atlassian.
fields.summary: Document control & record management as per ISO 13485

fields.description:
h3. Summary

If you create a publicly accessible space with all available permissions enabled for anonymous users, the Anonymous users cannot publish drafts.

h3. Environment
(Optional - If Applicable)
Cloud

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create a publicly available space by allowing anonymous access to confluence and providing all permissions to anonymous users under space permissions.
# Remove one of the permisisons and apply, then grant that same permission again and apply (there is an issue where anonymous users are unable to view the blueprints until you toggle any space permission for anonymous users off and on again.)
# as an anonymous user (either logged into an atlassian account as an unlicensed user in the instance, or not logged into an atlassian account at all, the results are the same in both cases) try to create a page in the space.
# Fill out the draft and publish

h3. Expected Results

You are able to publish the draft with no issues.

h3. Actual Results
You are either prompted to log in, or you are given an access denied page.
 
h3. Notes
N/A

h3.Workaround
There is no workaround at this time.
fields.summary: Add Pages Space permissions do not allow anonymous users to create pages

fields.description:
h3. Summary

Newly installed apps with dynamic macros can't be found in the list to insert into a page.

Other vendors at Atlassian App Week (Amsterdam 2017) have observed this issue in customer instances. Not all instances appear to be affected.
h3. Steps to Reproduce
 # Install a Connect app that has a dynamic macro (e.g. Navitabs Add-on, Tableau for Confluence, Numbered Headings, eazyBI for Jira in Confluence Cloud)
 # Create a new page
 # Try to insert a macro (e.g. "Tableau for Confluence") the app includes and observe that it doesn't appear in the list

h3. Expected Results

The newly added app's macros should appear in the macro list
h3. Actual Results

You cannot find the macros
h3. Impact

*_Affects both old and new editor_*
h3. Notes

Using incognito mode seems to work.
 I've done some more digging. There's a request behind the scenes when editing a page that goes to {{/wiki/plugins/macrobrowser/browse-macros.action?detailed=false&macroMetadataClientCacheKey=1}} which contains the list of all the macros. In both the normal and incognito browser modes it makes this request once and then continues to load it from the disk cache for future page edits (hence why newly installed add-on macros were not appearing). See the linked PR for more info.
h3. Workaround
 * Clear the browser cache OR
 * Work in incognito mode
fields.summary: Newly installed apps with dynamic macros can't be found in the list to insert into a page

fields.description:
h3. Summary 

Confluence displays the previous user logged in avatar after creating a page using the same browser for both sessions.

h3. Environment

Confluence Cloud.

h3. Steps to Reproduce
 # Work in confluence as you are used to
 # Log out
 # Confirm
 # Log in with a different user
 # Create a new empty page
 # Close it
 # Notice that your avatar is the one from the logged off user

h3. Expected Results

The avatar should be the one of the logged in user.
h3. Actual Results

The avatar which is displayed if the one of the previous logged in user.

h3. Notes

The issue was reproducible in Google Chrome and Firefox.

h3. Workaround

There is not known workaround.
fields.summary: Confluence displays the previous user logged in avatar after creating a page

fields.description:
h3.Summary
If you edit a page, write some text (i.e. Lorem Ipsum Dolor), and select only one word from the text, the whole paragraph gets altered.

h3.Steps to Reproduce
# Go to a Page
# Edit
# Write something down
# Select only a word, or a few words
# On the top-left corner, choose Preformatted

h3.Expected results
Only the selected area would be affected

h3.Actual Results
The whole paragraph is changed
fields.summary: Change text-style in the Editor not working properly

fields.description:
h3. Summary
Recently, users are having issues related to the access to the Billing Details section. Specifically, the following message is displayed:

{quote}
"We can't load this page right now"
{quote}

h3. Steps to Reproduce

It's unclear what's causing the issue, but, it's confirmed to be browser related. For the affected users/instances, the following steps can be followed:
# Be sure to be part of the *site-admins* group, so the *Site Administration* content can be accessed
# Click on the *Application Navigator > Site Administration*
# Click on *Billing* on the sidebar and select any of the options (e.g. Payment Details)

h3. Expected Results
The content of the Payment Details should be loaded
h3. Actual Results
No content is loaded. Only the "We can't load this page right now" information is displayed.

h3.Workaround
From the affected users, either accessing the browser through incognito mode or making sure to clear all the cache/cookies tied to the Atlassian products.
fields.summary: Issues Accessing Billing Details

fields.description:
Performance of the thumbnail generator seems to be dependent on the size of the attachment, but performance of the page content being rendered is dependent on the time it takes to generate thumbnails for all attachments in the page set to show a thumbnail.

Page performance noticeably starts to drop off around 50 attachments on the page, and performance seems to drop off at a rate of 1/10th of a second added per additional attachment that needs to be rendered.

This delays the rendering of the rest of the page content until the thumbnails have been rendered.

Suggested solutions:

1. Improve performance of generating thumbnails.
By improving the speed at which thumbnails are generated, we can get the page up faster.

2. Render textual information without the thumbnails, and load the thumbnails afterwards.
We can improve the perceived performance of confluence by loading in the thumbnails after rendering the text. I recommend rendering a statically sized box where the thumbnail will eventually be rendered to ensure the size of the content is the expected size to make anchors more reliable as well as providing a spot that the client can anticipate as being the attachment that they expect.
fields.summary: Improve Marginal Performance of Attachment Thumbnails

fields.description: "Insert markup" via the insert menu isn't working for both markdown and wikimarkup.
fields.summary: Inserting markup not working correctly

fields.description:
h3. Summary
When attempting to save edits on a page imported from Confluence Server, a "This content cannot be accessed. Your session may have expired, you can attempt to log in. " error is received.


h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Import a space with pages from Confluence server to Confluence Cloud
# Edit the page
# Try to save the page

h3. Expected Results

Page should save normally.

h3. Actual Results
"This content cannot be accessed. Your session may have expired, you can attempt to log in. " error is received, page cannot be saved.

h3.Workaround
Creating a Copy of the page, and replacing the impacted page with the copy will result in a page that can be edited. 

NOTE: The copy page operation does not copy comments, versions, or unpublished draft changes. If you use this workaround it is recommended to move the impacted page to a new space for archival purposes if you wish to retain comments and previous versions of the page.
fields.summary: Pages imported from Confluence Server cannot be edited, generate "This content cannot be accessed. Your session may have expired, you can attempt to log in. " error

fields.description:
h3. Summary
If you want to download a copy of a user's avatar from People Directory to use elsewhere, you can right-click the avatar, and select *Save Image As...* and it will prompt to download with a file name hash in the form of a .png file.

For certain avatars, the .png file extension isn't automatically added, and the image is only saved as {{user-avatar}}. 

On a Mac, this then is assumed to be a TextEdit file.

h3. Environment
* Confluence Cloud 1000.0.0-02447c1
* Replicated on Mac OS 10.11.6
* Chrome versions 61.0.3163 and 62.0.3202
* Safari version 11.0.1 

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Navigate to People Directory
# Right-click on a user avatar and *Save Image As...*
# Continue this for multiple users until one does not download with the .png file type

h3. Expected Results
All images should download with .png extension.

h3. Actual Results
 Occasionally images will not download with .png file type.

Working image:
!workingimage.png|thumbnail!
Non-working image:
!nonworkingimage.png|thumbnail!

h3. Notes
Untested yet on Windows

h3.Workaround
The image still appears to download correctly, as I am able to open it automatically in Preview.
You can append .png to the end of the file. The computer will ask you to confirm this, but once you do, the thumbnail loads properly as well and the info screen confirms it is indeed a .png file type.
fields.summary: Downloading users' avatars from People Directory occasionally saves without file extension

fields.description:
* Create a preformatted block style
* Type some text
* Hit enter

Expected
* Style changes to Paragraph

Actual
* Stays in Preformatted

Workaround
* Press Shift+Enter to exit the block and create a paragraph.

Notes
* Enter key lets you create multi-lined preformatted blocks
fields.summary: Hitting enter in a preformatted block style, does not exit the block and create a paragraph

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce

# Create a page with three stacked full-width layouts
# First first and last layout with lots of text to fill the viewport
# Into the second layout, paste some text

Expected
* Your viewport doesn't move

Actual
* Your viewport scrolls and your pasted text is above your viewport and not visible.
fields.summary: Pasting text into a tall page with layouts scrolls the viewport hiding your text

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Cloud*. Using *Confluence Server*? [See the corresponding bug report|https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-27018].
  {panel}


*This only happens with copied/pasted text*. 

When you copy and paste content from a .txt file (like the one attached) and attempt to apply headings to a paragraph, Confluence will apply headings to more lines that you have initially highlighted. This probably happens because the content pasted on the page is not formatted accordingly (i.e there isn't line breaks between paragraphs) and that confuses the editor.

Steps to reproduce:

# Copy a text with paragraphs (.txt)
# On Confluence go to a page or a new page > Edit > Paste the .txt
# Select a word or a phrase > click on Paragraph > Select a 'Heading' (1, 2...)

The 'heading' will be applied to all paragraph.

!screenshot.png!
fields.summary: Heading is affecting further than what's being highlighted
Links in exported PDF is redirecting back to Cloud instances for pages with special character in title

fields.description:
h3. Summary
If an attachment uses *'* or *&* in its file name, accessing it from the *Attachments* menu of a page will return a _Page not found_ error message.

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Upload an attachment which names include a *'*  or *&* character.
# From the *Attachment* menu of the page, click on the attachment name.

h3. Expected Results
The attachment is downloaded properly.

h3. Actual Results
You are redirected to a _Page not found_ page.
 
h3. Notes
The URL  transform *'* properly to *'* which provides a URL that does not work.

h3.Workaround
Retrieve the attachment from an attachment macro or by clicking on the *View* button and then use the download button while previewing the file.
Alternatively, rename the file (replace "&" with "and" or remove the single quotes), then reupload the attachment(s).
fields.summary: If an attachment has a single quote or ampersand in its name, accessing it from the Attachments menu will return a Page not Found error message

fields.description:
h3. Summary
When creating a link to an anchor, the link is not properly built with the correct anchor name causing the link to fail or not redirect to the correct content.

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Put an anchor on your page with a name *anchortest*
# Highlight some text on the same page and create a link to this anchor.

h3. Expected Results
The link is properly created and redirects you to the anchor once you publish the page.

h3. Actual Results
The link is created but only to the page itself or to an anchor with a cropped name (eg. *anchort* instead of *anchortest*)
 
h3.Workaround
Once you have entered your anchor's name, add a space before the *#* character then immediately remove it and save. The link will be properly created.
fields.summary: Links to anchor created are not working properly

fields.description:
h3. Summary
Line break from GMail and Evernote are not recognized by Confluence and are removed after you publish the page.

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Copy text from GMail or Evernote which includes line breaks.
# Paste it on a Confluence page.
# Publish the page.

h3. Expected Results
The page is properly published with the line breaks.

h3. Actual Results
The page is published but the line breaks are removed.
 
h3.Workaround
Paste the text first in a text editor then copy paste it again to Confluence and publish the page.
Or manually re-insert the line breaks after pasting to Confluence.
fields.summary: Line break from GMail and Evernote are not recognized by Confluence editor after publication.

fields.description:
h3. Summary

The webhook is not being fired whenever the attachment is viewed. This is impacting live customers, it was found via a support request.
h3. Steps to Reproduce
 # Install Connect Inspector app (https://connect-inspector.atlassian.io/page/start)
 # Create a Confluence page
 # Add an attachment to that page
 # View the attachment:
 ## Via the attachments page; or
 ## Via it included on the page, etc.
 # Observe in Connect Inspector that no attachment_viewed webhook is being fired

h3. Expected Results

The attachment_viewed webhook is fired.
h3. Actual Results

Webhook is not being triggered.
h3. Notes

In Analytics we log webhook data to present back insights. Here's an aggregate of activity for the "attachment_viewed" webhook each month across all customers. This data suggests something may have been broken in September this year.
{code:java}
+------------------------+---------+
| date                   |   count |
|------------------------+---------|
| 2017-05-01 00:00:00+00 |  47,899 |
| 2017-06-01 00:00:00+00 |  49,483 |
| 2017-07-01 00:00:00+00 |  32,074 |
| 2017-08-01 00:00:00+00 |  33,048 |
| 2017-09-01 00:00:00+00 |  15,691 |
| 2017-10-01 00:00:00+00 |   7,376 |
| 2017-11-01 00:00:00+00 |   3,889 |
+------------------------+---------+
{code}
fields.summary: attachment_viewed webhook is not working

only open the link

fields.description:
h3. Summary

When using the REST API endpoint /rest/api/contentbody/convert/export_view
the URL returned for images is mangled.

h3. Environment
Cloud

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Use  /rest/api/contentbody/convert/export_view rest endpoint to get rendered table body with images in it

h3. Expected Results
URL for the image given is the properly formed url 
like this:

https://example.atlassian.net/wiki/download/attachments/77111777/image2017-11-4_11-13-38.png?version=1&modificationDate=1509783222063&cacheVersion=1&api=v2

h3. Actual Results
URL returned is mangled and looks more like this:
https://example.atlassian.net/wiki/download/attachments/embedded-page/EX/Copy%20of%20test:%20UI/UX%20issues/user%20avatar%20(1)%20here.png?api=v2
 
h3. Notes
NA

h3.Workaround
The workaround at this time is to escape the non-escaped "/" character between the "UI/UX" which shows up on pages with names with slashes in them.

fields.description:
In order to edit a page in Confluence, we will need to click on the option to have it edited so the users will be able to change the content. 

With that in mind, for some users, it might be practical to have an option like a text box (inline comment) in order to add the content in the Confluence page. Basically, create a page that allows end users to modify page without going into the Edit mode, where the end users can check a checkbox, and be able to enter some text. This way, end users would be able to quickly update a page.
fields.summary: Text Box for Editing a Confluence Page Externally

After a space import, Gliffy diagrams linked from other pages (that are also part of the import) are displayed as not found because the page ID has not been updated after the import.

h3. Expected Results
The Gliffy diagrams are all displayed properly.

h3. Actual Results

fields.description:
h3. Summary
In Windows, the "undo" keyboard shortcut is CTRL+Z. In the recent Cloud Confluence editor, the button to undo has been removed, requiring users to user the "undo" and "redo" shortcuts instead.
However, the CTRL+Z shortcut does not appear to be responding in Windows environments.

h3. Environment
* Confluence Cloud with New Editor.
* Microsoft Windows OS
* External Keyboard

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create a page in Confluence.
# Make changes on the page.
# Type CTRL+Z which would normally remove the last change made.

h3. Expected Results
Last change should be reverted.

h3. Actual Results
There is no response to CTRL+Z and the last change is not removed.

h3.Workaround
No current workaround to undo changes.
fields.summary: Undo Keyboard Shortcut Ctrl+z is not working when using external keyboard

fields.description:
h3. Problem Definition
Customers who are using the Jira Issues Macro to display a saved filter which has a configured a custom column display within the Jira Issue Navigator needs to manually recreate the Column Order within Confluence

Jira Issue Navigator:
 !IssueNavigator.png|thumbnail! 
Jira Issues Macro in Confluence:
 !JiraIssuesMacro.png|thumbnail! 

h3. Suggested Solution
If a Saved Filter is being used in the Jira Issues Macro, display it in the same fashion as if it was seen through the Jira Issue Navigator
 
h3. Workaround 
Manually configure Columns to display within the Jira Issues Macro

fields.description:
h3. Summary
Pasting Images from Google Docs is not possible

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# On a Google Docs document with images, pick one of them, right-click and select *Copy*
# On a Confluence page (Edit Mode), right-click and select *Paste*

h3. Expected Results
The image should be pasted

h3. Actual Results
The image is not pasted.
If you publish the page, no changes are recorded on the page's Storage Format.
fields.summary: Pasting Images from Google Docs is not possible

fields.description:
h3. Summary

PDF Export hangs/takes too long to export pages with JIRA Issues Macro. The more *JIRA Issues Macro* inside the page, the longer it takes for the export to finish.

If the page uses nested macros with an Excerpt-Include macro to include another page that has more nested macros + the JIRA Issues Macro, the export hangs even longer.

Also, it seems that the PDF export iterates over all the issues, not only the number of displayed issues set in the JIRA Issues Macro. This means that instead of requesting 60 issues from JIRA to receive the images - type and priority (e.g. 3 JIRA Issues Macro showing 20 issues each), it iterates over hundreds/thousands of issues depending on the filter, even though it's only going to export the display limit of each macro.
h3. Steps to Reproduce
 # Have a JIRA with a lot of created issues for testing.
 # Create the application links between Confluence and JIRA.
 # Create a page, add the Excerpt Macro and 6 JIRA Issues Macros filtering type = story inside it, for example.
 # Create another page, add the Panel Macro > add the Tip/Expand or any other similar macro inside the Panel > add the Excerpt Include macro to include the page created in step 3.
 # Attempt to export the page from step 4 to PDF.

h3. Expected Results

The PDF File will be generated within seconds.
h3. Actual Results
It takes a long time to finish, from exporting in seconds to exporting in several minutes

h3. Notes
 * It seems that the export takes even longer in these scenarios:
 ** When we try to export a page using Excerpt Include to include another page that uses *JIRA Issues macro*.
 ** When there's a nested usage of macros before the Excerpt Include macro. e.g. Panel > Tip > Excerpt Include
 * It does not happen when exporting to Word.

h3. Workaround
 # If you don't need to show the results of the JIRA Issues Macro in the PDF Export:
 ## Go to Confluence Administration > PDF Stylesheet
 ## Add these two lines there:
{code:java}
div[id^="jira-issues-"] { display: none; }
div[class^="refresh-issues-bottom"] { display: none; }
{code}
 # We can remove all icons (issue types and priority) in order to avoid these calls to JIRA:
 ## Go to Confluence Administration > PDF Stylesheet
 ## Add it there:
{code:java}
img.icon {  display: none !important; }
{code}
 # If you still need to have the JIRA Issues Macro results in the PDF exports, we can only improve the performance a little bit:
 ## It helps a bit if we remove the _Issue Type_ column from the JIRA Issues Macros.
 # Export to Word instead
fields.summary: PDF Export Hangs When Exporting Page With JIRA Issues Macro and Nested Macros

fields.description:
h3. Summary
If you disable Confluence Questions, the questions will remain being displayed in the search results of Confluence.

h3. Environment
Confluence 1000.0.0-ea845b9

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create some questions in Confluence using the Confluence questions add-on
# Disable the add-on
# Use Confluence search with words you can find on the questions.

h3. Expected Results
No questions being displayed since the add-on is disabled

h3. Actual Results
Questions are displayed in the search results, but are not accessible.
 
h3.Workaround
You can archive or delete the spaces, although if the space has more content besides the questions, it can be a problem since we would lose all content, not just the questions.
fields.summary: Questions keep displaying in Confluence after disabling add-on

fields.description:
h3. Summary
When trying to use the "Import Word Document" functionality on a page, nothing happens.

# Go to any page
# Click on the *Ellipsis (...) > Import Word Document*
# Click on *Select File to Import*

h3. Expected Behavior
A prompt to choose the file to be uploaded should appear

h3. Actual Behavior
As soon as the page below loads, an error is thrown in the console:
{code}https://INSTANCE.atlassian.net/wiki/pages/wordimport/wordimportupload.action?pageId=SOMETHING{code}

The error is the following:
 !error.png|thumbnail! 

Then, when clicking on the button, nothing happens.
fields.summary: Error thrown when trying to use "Import Word Document" functionality

fields.description:
h3. Summary
If you select a line from a bullet point list and apply a style to it, then all children will get the style as well if you select the hidden character at the end of the main line.

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Select a line from a bullet point like so:
 !Screen Shot 2017-11-08 at 12.55.57.png|thumbnail! 
# Apply a bold style to it.

h3. Expected Results
Only the selected line will become bold.

h3. Actual Results
The style is also applied to the children lines:
 !Screen Shot 2017-11-08 at 12.56.51.png|thumbnail! 
 
h3.Workaround
Make sure you are only selecting the line and not the additional character at the end and then apply the style.
fields.summary: Applying a style to a bullet point line will apply it to its children

fields.description:
h3. Summary
Links - the pasted URL address  in Address field has /(slash), cannot press the Insert button.


h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Copy the URL. ex http://www.atlassian.com/
# Press Insert Link button on toolbar.
# Point cursor to Address field
# Right click and then Select paste by context menu
# The URL was pasted, but the Insert button is disable.

h3. Expected Results
after pasting the URL, also display the URL in Link text field. and enable Insert button.

h3. Actual Results
disabled Insert button. and not display the URL text  in Link text field.
 
h3.Workaround
Use keyboard shortcut for paste in Address field. 
* windows: Ctrl+v
* macos: Command+v
fields.summary: Links- the pasted URL address  in Address field has /(slash), cannot press the Insert button.

fields.description:
h3. Summary
JIRA Issue macro doesn't render, especially with multiple macros in a Confluence page. The error displayed is _Refresh didn't work. Try again or click an issue to see it in JIRA._

h3. Environment
* 

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create a blank test page.
# Add a table with multiple rows and columns. Populate the columns with text, leaving one column free.
# In the empty column of the first row, add a Jira Issue macro with the Search: key in (<issue key>)
# Copy and paste this macro in all the empty column rows.
# Save the page.

h3. Expected Results
Issues are shown as configured in the macro.

h3. Actual Results
Refresh didn't work. Try again or click an issue to see it in JIRA.
See attached video. [^Jira.Issue.Macro.1a.mp4] 
 
h3. Notes
* 

h3.Workaround
# Open the macro on edit mode.
# For every macro, change th Jira Issue macro with the Search: *from* _key in (<issue key>)_ *to* _key = <issue key>_.
# Click on the _magnifying glass_ to refresh the search.
# Click on _insert_ button.
# Save the page.
fields.summary: JIRA Issue macro doesn't render; gives warning: Refresh didn't work...

fields.description:
h3. Summary
h3. Environment

Cloud

All browsers
h3. Steps to Reproduce

Import a Word document
 1. Create a page in Confluence or go to an existing page. Click the ellipse
 2. Choose > Import Word Document
 3. Choose Select File...This button has no response
h3. Expected Results
 * file explorer to choose document to import appears

h3. Actual Results

From the Dev Console in Chrome
{code}com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.confluence-word-import-plugin:word-import-upload-resource.js?externals=__local-default__&locale=en-GB:1 Error: confluence-word-import-plugin/javascript/word-import-upload missing confluence/api/meta
at s (batch.js?externals=__local-default__&locale=en-GB:14)
at r (batch.js?externals=__local-default__&locale=en-GB:12)
at i (batch.js?externals=__local-default__&locale=en-GB:15)
at Object.safeRequire (batch.js?externals=__local-default__&locale=en-GB:25)
at com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.confluence-word-import-plugin:word-import-upload-resource.js?externals=__local-default__&locale=en-GB:5 {code}

h3. Notes

h3. Workaround

I know of no workaround at present
fields.summary: The import word, file select is unresponsive
The import word, file select is unresponsive
lookandfeel/custom rest api scontent.screen.background linear-gradient does not reflect changes in new Confluence experience

fields.description:
h3. Summary

When creating a fixed width table in the Confluence page editor, The width of the table is slightly smaller when published. This will cause text to wrap if the size of the column was just large enough to accommodate the text as single lines.

h3. Environment
Cloud

h3. Steps to Reproduce
- Create a table with a column that has a fair amount of normal words in it. Lorum ipsum will work. Here is an example:
=== Example Table In Editor ===
!example table in edior.png|thumbnail! 
===
- Publish the page.

h3. Expected Results

The Table looks exactly as it does in the editor.

h3. Actual Results

The table is shrunk slightly and the text in the table is wrapped like so:
=== Example Table Published ===
 !Example table published.png|thumbnail! 
===

 
h3. Notes
N/A

h3.Workaround
The only known workaround is to make the Table slightly wider than the editor shows to accommodate the text after the slight shrink of the overall table width.
fields.summary: Fixed Width Tables in edit mode are not the same width as when published.
User mention isn't passed through properly when replying to an inline comment causing lost of notification

fields.description:
h3. Step to reproduce:
 # Copy JIRA issue URL. e.g https://atl-vertigo-afro.atlassian.net/browse/TEST-4
 # Create a confluence page
 # Create a comment that contains a JIRA Issue Macro by pasting the URL that you have just copied to the newly created confluence page.
 # Save the comment

h3. Expected Behaviour
JIM is rendered properly

h3. Actual Behaviour
JIMs cannot be rendered completely on comments. : There is a spin loading forever.
 !screenshot-1.png|thumbnail!
fields.summary: Jira Issues Macro loading forever when creating a new comment

fields.description:
h3. Problem
We can't add Task Report macro on Jira as other gadgets since it doesn't have a xml code to be added by support team

h3. Suggestion
Allow the Task report macro to be used in Jira by adding it on the gadgets through xml.

h3. Workarounds
None
fields.summary: Task Report macro on Jira

fields.description:
h3. Summary
When using any search mechanism in Confluence, if a page contains a number zero (0) and the other contains a different number in the end of its title, the search will not respect the correct numbering order (from zero to nine):

!numbering.png|thumbnail!

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create page with different numbers on their titles (e.g. one for Test 9.1.0, and other for Test 9.1.1)
# User the Search feature of Confluence (either the quick search or the full search)

h3. Expected Results
The search result should bring it according to the correct order, as the alphabetic one.

h3. Actual Results
There's no order configured for the results. 

h3. Notes
This issue might take some time to be reproduced, once the instance presents the behavior after some specific time. For example, in the video called *number.mp4* attached in this case, the search results change each time that the user hits the search option. To test the quick search on this part, you can just hit the 'space' key and backspace until the search results suddenly change.

h3.Workaround
No workaround found at the moment.
fields.summary: Incorrect Order for Numeric Search Results

fields.description: When receiving Recommended Updates notification by email, the Header text for the *Page Title* overlaps the *Avatar* image.
fields.summary: Bad layout of "recommended updates" in newsletter

fields.description:
h3. Summary

* Insert Code Block Macro into table cell, insert column causes extra column in macro 

h3. Environment

* Cloud 



h3. Steps to Reproduce

# Create a table of any size. (Even 1x1)
# Insert a macro (e.g., code) into any cell.
# Focus the caret in the first cell of that row (doesn't need to have anything in that cell).
# Add a column,
# Observe that the column is added to both the table and to the macro.

h3. Expected Results

additional columns added in front or after the selected cell with macro.

h3. Actual Results
*  Columns are added into the macro, as well as the table
 
h3. Notes
* when published, the it doesn't necessarily reflect the problem experienced while in the editor, however any text entered into the Code Block macro, does not show up, in my testig.

h3.Workaround
* Copying the page, apparently is a work around.
fields.summary: Insert Code Block Macro into table cell, insert column causes produces column in Macro too
